N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.3 - Notices to family and others

State Regulations

If a patient leaves a department facility or facility
issued an operating certificate without notice or fails to return when expected
from a known visit away from the facility, the family or near friend of the
patient shall be notified immediately and written record shall be made of the
time and method of notification and persons notified. If the facility deems it
appropriate, police authorities may be notified and requested to assist in
locating the patient. Notes
